snippet: A banking union would be the most ambitious effort to achieve fuller financial and economic integration since the introduction of the euro.
abstract: European Union finance officials meet, hoping finally to agree on system for winding down failing euro zone banks, which would be pillar of bloc's efforts to construct full banking union; it would be the most ambitious effort to achieve fuller financial and economic integration since the introduction of the euro.
lead_paragraph: A banking union would be the most ambitious effort to achieve fuller financial and economic integration since the introduction of the euro.

headline.main: Europe Tries Again to Address Weak Banks
headline.print_headline: Europe Tries Again to Address Weak Banks
